## plotly

```{r}

library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
gp34 |> 
  nest_by(Study) |> 
  mutate(
    p = 
      plot_ly(data,
              type = "scatter",
              mode = "lines+markers",
              color = ~`FXS ID`,
              x = ~`Event Name`,
              y = ~`Age at visit`,
              showlegend = FALSE
      ) |> 
      plotly::layout(
        xaxis = list(title = "")
        # title = "banana"
      ) |> 
      list()
  ) |> 
  pull(p) |> 
  plotly::subplot(
    nrows = 1, shareX = TRUE, shareY = TRUE)

```

## ggplot

```{r}

library(ggplot2)

plot1 = gp34 |> 
  ggplot(
    data = _,
    mapping = aes(
      color = `FXS ID`,
      group = `FXS ID`,
      y = `Event Name`,
      x = `Age at visit`
    )) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw() +
  facet_grid(rows = vars(Gender)) +
  theme(legend.position="none")

print(plot1)

plot1 |> plotly::ggplotly()


```

## demographics

```{r}

participants = 
  gp34 |> 
  arrange(`Age at visit`) |> 
  group_by(`FXS ID`) |> 
  filter(n_distinct(`Age of onset`, na.rm = TRUE) != 1) |> 
  print()
  

```
